Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My teachers don't usually provide too much feedback about different ways to go about my works, but I have not used GenAI very much in that respect so cannot really comment on its effectiveness.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback was certainly more precise and immediately helpful.
